title: Mia Chloe
author: Mia Chloe
created_time: June 30, 2023, 03:06:18 PMLast edit: June 30, 2023, 10:05:46 PM by Mia Chloe
content: Good day my fellow Bitcoin talkers and poem lovers I have been working on this poem during my free time for a while now please do well to read throughüôè it may cheer you up.This poem is dedicated to this forum and Bitcoin investors out there as well as those who contribute to the development of BitcoinA story I shall tell ¬†in the world of digital gold where the cryptocurrency Bitcoin shines and progresses magnificently.a crown for a blockchain, a decentralized wonder,stay with me as I ¬†share a wonderful Bitcoin poem with you.A magnificent ¬†currency, the gift Satoshi chose, emerged from the depths of the web.With the help of cryptographic wizardry, a revolution in banking was made available for all to useOh Bitcoin, how wonderful and valuable it is using hashes and algorithms Miners toil nonstop as they extract and circulateThey dig deep uncovering the Bitcoin treasures ¬†in a cryptographic verseWhales and hodlers build up their fortunes never lacking despite market fluctuations.Emotions at work, trading the volatility day after day holders stay strong not waive at market fluctuations for their belief in Bitcoin is strong.For tale of pizza were made,even those of early adopters, whose wallets now hodl.some mocked the notion, "Digital gold? hahaüòÇ"But now they bask in its glory, and wanting to hodlBut amidst the excitement and joy, caution is wise,For scams and hacks lurk ¬†cleverly in disguise.Secure your wallets, and guard your keys ,Or risk losing it all ? for that shall be ¬†a crypto nightmare!Oh a blessing Satoshi is , a messiah to the internet ¬†he is ¬†with the help of believers a wonderful forum "BITCOIN TALK" was born, for all to partake in this revolution.So let us jubilate, this crypto revolution,The rise of Bitcoin, a decentralized dream for with this joy friends do not forget to invest and hodl as most dedicated members of this forum spend a lot of time here I wrote this as a little token of appreciation

comments.author: Clark Anderson
comments.body: Weldone mate, I appreciate and appluad your creativity in crafting your poem. It serves as a reminder of the excitement and potential of the crypto revolution and also sees the need for a wise and secure network. ''The Blockchain''Quote from: Mia Chloe on June 30, 2023, 03:06:18 PMBut amidst the excitement and joy, caution is wise,For scams and hacks lurk¬† cleverly in disguise.Secure your wallets, and guard your keys ,Or risk losing it all ? for that shall be¬† a crypto nightmare!I guess that should be the part I love the most. It's definitely a nightmare, when you wake up and find out that all your assets have been stolen by the so called scammers. So we all have to keep our keys safe and be careful where you login to on the internet.

But nevertheless, I will like to make some corrections to your poem calling Satoshi the messiah to the internet which is not true, because while Bitcoin was developed/launch in 2009, the internet was invented by Tim Berners-Lee in the year 1989 (i.e 34yrs ago)Quote from: Mia Chloe on June 30, 2023, 05:45:53 PMThanks mateSecondly, writing two words as a response to a comment is not necessary, as it's not compulsory you must appreciate everyone who comments on your forum contribution. But if you must, try to be detailed, as that is referred to as spam.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Well, at least you have rhymed on a board that has sincerely lost it, the rhymed, the big discussions have sincerely gone... before, reading was a pleasure, sometimes without the need to respond, there were times when the silence of not saying anything was the best answer.I once told someone who wanted to learn about bitcoin, ¬†starts to learning some over poetry or something else that you like, since many want to pursue advanced knowledge of bitcoin without even really knowing if it's what they want to do.Since, just like poetry is enjoyed, without having to be crazy in rhyming or writing, sometimes bitcoin is just for use and that gives you that learning baggage over time, then, we may not be able to write a poem, but when we read it, we know it is, the same thing happens with bitcoin, you may not understand how it works but using it is financial poetry.bitcoin is easy to use but understanding it in depth requires learning its rules, but in the meantime it's like enjoying a poem after it's written and finished.
